column1: Complete Line and Create New Line  Ctrl+Shift+SEMICOLON
Extend Selection to Beginning of Document  Ctrl+Shift+HOME
Extend Selection to Beginning of Text on Line  Shift+HOME
Extend Selection to End of Document  Ctrl+Shift+END
Extend Selection to End of Line  Shift+END
Extend Selection to Matching Brace  Ctrl+Shift+OPEN_BRACKET
Extend Selection to Next Page  Shift+PAGE_DOWN
Extend Selection to Next Word  Ctrl+Shift+KP_RIGHT, Ctrl+Shift+RIGHT
Extend Selection to Previous Page  Shift+PAGE_UP
Extend Selection to Previous Word  Ctrl+Shift+KP_LEFT, Ctrl+Shift+LEFT
Insertion Point to Beginning of Document  Ctrl+HOME
Insertion Point to Beginning of Text on Line  HOME
Insertion Point to End of Document  Ctrl+END
Insertion Point to End of Line  END
Insertion Point to Matching Brace  Ctrl+OPEN_BRACKET
Insertion Point to Next Word  Ctrl+RIGHT, Ctrl+KP_RIGHT
Insertion Point to Previous Word  Ctrl+LEFT, Ctrl+KP_LEFT
Move Insertion Point to Bottom  Alt+Shift+END
Move Insertion Point to Center  Alt+Shift+INSERT
Move Insertion Point to Top  Alt+Shift+HOME
Clean and Build Main Project  Alt+Shift+F11, Shift+F11
